channel.title: This Week In Google
channel.description: Leo Laporte, Gina Trapani, Jeff Jarvis and their guests talk about the latest Google and cloud computing news. Recorded live at 4 p.m. Eastern/1 p.m. Pacific/2000 UTC on Wednesdays and released later that evening. Part of the TWiT Netcast Network.
channel.generator: Feeder 2.2.4(1524); Mac OS X Version 10.6.8 (Build 10K549) http://reinventedsoftware.com/feeder/

channel.itunes:subtitle: Leo Laporte, Gina Trapani, Jeff Jarvis and their guests talk about the latest Google and cloud computing news.
channel.itunes:summary: Leo Laporte, Gina Trapani, Jeff Jarvis and their guests talk about the latest Google and cloud computing news. Recorded live at 4 p.m. Eastern/1 p.m. Pacific/2000 UTC on Wednesdays and released later that evening. Part of the TWiT Netcast Network.
channel.itunes:keywords: twit, google, cloud computing, jeff jarvis, gina trapani, leo laporte

item.title: This Week In Google 150: SIM surgery
item.description:
Hosts: Leo Laporte, Jeff Jarvis, Gina Trapani and Clay Johnson.

Samsung Galaxy SIII review, James Spann VS Facebook, Google Street View Trekker, who has your back? and more
Guest: James Spann
